mapper.insert: insert into account(email, name, address, tel, card_no,zipcode,address_detail) values(#{email}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{cardNo},#{zipcode},#{addressDetail})

select account_no from( select account_no from account order by regdate desc ) where rownum='1'
insert into hash(account_no, salt, digest) values(#{accountNo}, #{salt}, #{digest})
mapper.select: select count(*) from account where email = #{email}

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regdate , NVL(SUM(a.cnt),0) count FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regdate , COUNT(*) cnt FROM account WHERE regdate BETWEEN to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') AND to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') GROUP BY regdate ORDER BY regdate ) a , (SELECT to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd')) b WHERE b.dt = a.regdate(+) GROUP BY b.dt ORDER BY b.dt
